name: Dante and the Flower of Life
name_original: Dante and the Flower of Life
description:
Dante and the Flower of Life is a massive labor of love. I'm not a professional game designer. I'm a tarot card reader, actually : )  This is my very first game I've ever done and I used RPG Maker MV to turn my visions into reality.

I just had a story in my head along with dialogs, music and beautiful scenes, so this game is more of an adventure game or a visual novel then a classic RPG. There are some battles but it's not the main focus of the game.  The main focus is the story.

The game is roughly over an hour and 15 minutes of game play, depending on how well you'll do with the puzzles : )

Your role is that of an Immortal named Dante, whose been living peacefully in the Heavenly Realm for centuries, when suddenly the Flower of Life, the artifact that is safe guarding the full existence of the Human Realm, disappears...

FEATURES:

  • Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch
  • A few Immortals and one handsome demon
  • A swamp, Immortal realms, one hipster pub with locally brewed beer
  • One well educated sailor
  • An alcoholic witch with a flair for purely non-psychotropic frogs
  • A depressed vegetable seller
  • Centaurs! 
  • A skeleton named Gladys

...Last but not least...there may be some unstable goats...

More about me : http://tarot-and-mandalas.com/
